item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Thats a static reference. You should know what static means, but since you obviously don’t it means that the field is the same for every instance of that class, and you don’t even need an instance to access that field. You would have to make the playerPoints field non-static and then reference the client object that killed the Npc.
